CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 19, 1955, pg. 4 reads: "The Victim's Wife - Mrs. Henry Pulliam (right) of 343 State Street, Clairton, the wife of the Oct. 26 victim of Richard Frazier's shotgun blast, chats with a friend, Ivory June Carter, now of New Kensington, who was a guest at the disastrous birthday party of Lillian Meaders at the time of the killing. The conversation took place outside the Criminal Courtroom of Judge Russell H. Adams during Frazier's murder trial. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Ivory June Carter wearing light colored short sleeved blouse and skirt, and dark scarf around neck, and Mrs. Henry Pulliam, standing in corridor of Allegheny County Courthouse
